org.apache.giraph.comm.aggregators

接口 WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor

  • 所有已知实现类:
    NettyWorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor

    public interface WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
    Aggregates worker aggregator requests and sends them off

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void distributeAggregators(Iterable<byte[]> aggregatorDataList)
      Sends aggregators to all other workers
      void flush()
      Flush aggregated values cache.
      boolean sendAggregatedValue(String aggregatorName, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable aggregatedValue)
      Sends worker aggregated value to the owner of aggregator
      void sendAggregatedValuesToMaster(byte[] aggregatorData)
      Sends aggregated values to the master.

    • 方法详细资料

      • sendAggregatedValue

        boolean sendAggregatedValue(String aggregatorName,
                          org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable aggregatedValue)
                            throws IOException
        Sends worker aggregated value to the owner of aggregator
        参数:
        aggregatorName - Name of the aggregator
        aggregatedValue - Value of the aggregator
        返回:
        True if aggregated value will be sent, false if this worker is the owner of the aggregator
        抛出:
        IOException

      • flush

        void flush()
           throws IOException
        Flush aggregated values cache.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • sendAggregatedValuesToMaster

        void sendAggregatedValuesToMaster(byte[] aggregatorData)
                                  throws IOException
        Sends aggregated values to the master. This worker is the owner of these aggregators.
        参数:
        aggregatorData - Serialized aggregator data
        抛出:
        IOException

      • distributeAggregators

        void distributeAggregators(Iterable<byte[]> aggregatorDataList)
                           throws IOException
        Sends aggregators to all other workers
        参数:
        aggregatorDataList - Serialized aggregator data split into chunks
        抛出:
        IOException
